website_summaries.verdict: It's stylish and has some nice features, but it also has some concerns.
cons: Some complaints that the fan is noisy
No way to operate it without remote (no pull chain)

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS FAN
customer_reviews.text: If the remote breaks that comes with the fan the entire fan is useless. Harbor Breeze no longer makes this fan and there is no replacement remote that will work with this model. There is also no pull chain so the remote is the only way to make it work. You also can't replace the receiver inside the fan as it's attached to the motor. If you bought this fan from Lowe's Harbor Breeze told me they would replace it for free. Since I bought it from Amazon I'm not sure if I have any chance of getting this thing to work again. Either way it looks like I'll have to completely replace the fan after 1 year of use.
customer_reviews.author: lilacandlipgloss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fan!!!! Only problem is that I now want one for every room in my house!!! I bought a 12 inch down rod for this since I had a higher ceiling and it was perfect!!! It is much more stunning in person than it is in the pictures. Beautiful design and love the remote control feature so you don't have hanging cords to deal with. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, but not for just a year
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this fan for less than a year and the blades are starting to droop. We have a very high ceiling so it never gets wet. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Sandsabar

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to install where my old fans had been
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received three of these. They were easy to install where my old fans had been. The instructions were very easy to follow. The remotes work great and the light bulbs can be dimmed by holding the light button down until the desired brightness is achieved. The only problem I have is that the bulbs that come with the fans are 40 watt screw-ins and a special size. With the globe design, the light in each room is dim compared to the light I'm used to so I will have to search for higher wattage bulbs that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Well worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these fans! They are made of high quality materials for outdoor use, no worries of warping blades, even in high humidity. I spend soooo much more time on my West facing back patio since I put these in. The lights are perfect for a gentle mood, fans move the air very effectively. Perfect! I placed 2 on a patio measuring 30’ x 14’6” in the hot dry plains/desert climate of SouthEastern New Mexico, where we frequently reach 105-110 degrees daily. I would not think of trading these for anything different.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The remote doesn’t work and therefore neither does the fan !
customer_reviews.text: The remote doesn’t work and therefore neither does the fan ! It looks good - we complained and was sent another remote that worked once and drained the $6 battery in one day ! It is useless to us ! I hope the company reads this and redesigns the remote and sends us one !!
customer_reviews.author: JC Carroll

customer_reviews.title: We love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these fans 8 years ago for an additional fan on our covered patio. It has held up so well we wanted to replace the one that came with the house to match. We found it on here and when it came in the glass globe had been broken in shipping. I called Merrimack customer service and they are shipping a replacement no-questions-asked. The fan was easy to install. The instructions are very clear, my husband’s favorite part. And my favorite part... it looks Great!!!! Plus we have a nice breeze on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is beautiful! I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NaomiPlus5

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked a couple of pull chains in case the remote ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these on my back porch for a couple of months now. They function as promised. The remote is the only way to control them though. I would have liked a couple of pull chains in case the remote is lost or fails in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Vdoman

customer_reviews.title: Not all the same. Bought 2 one burns bright one does not
customer_reviews.text: There is an electrical problem inside one of them. Same bulbs for both. One burns bright the other one dim. My electrician said the wiring is bad inside the fan it's self. Not my electrical. Would like a new one shipped to me. No way to make them look the same on my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: MParsons

customer_reviews.title: Great for both indoors/outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I had a professional install this the first time then had my living room gutted due to ice dams, so reinstalled it when the contractors left their scaffolding. Super happy with it! The remote is the best since I have 18 foot vaulted ceilings and the light slowly comes on with the touch of a button. The fan itself is quiet and balanced easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Even my electrician liked it.
customer_reviews.text: According to my electrician, it was easy to install, well balanced, and a nice looking fan. The remote is simple to use, comes with a wall hanger which my electrician put next to my lanai door. It runs quietly. There are 3 speeds and the light has a seperate button and there is a seperate off button. You just have to learn to hold the button to make it either a dim or bright light or in between. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: Patio fan
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks great on my patio. Survived the hurricanes in NC, still running as it should. Good product! UPDATE:1 year later, Fan still working like a charm, no wobble, moves air wonderfully, still looks like new. Installed outside close to the North Carolina coast on my patio. Great product folks, take the negative comments with a grain of salt. I will be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Had picked this fan out at a chain Home Improvement store and it was $30 cheaper buying on Amazon. We used an extension pole since our ceilings are vaulted. Installation was easy. Love the remote controls for dimming the light and controlling the speed. A little bummed that there are no pull cords. Hope the remote doesn't get lost! Overall J am so loving this fan for our new rustic farmhouse decor home!
customer_reviews.author: Angela H

customer_reviews.title: Item was obviously used!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this fan to replace the same fan that is on our covered deck. The new one arrived with a broken shade and corroded parts! Luckily, since we were replacing the same existing fan, because the remote quick working and the fan could not be turned on without the lights; and the speed could not be adjusted; we had the parts to replace the ones that were defective. Although, we did have to make a trip to the hardware store for installation hardware, too. I thought we were purchasing a brand new fan! I hate it when that happens with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product but I installed it and it won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product but I installed it and it won’t work . Had some one else take a look and it won’t work ..... did all the trouble shooting and even did a you tube trouble shoot and it still won’t work !!! Any one else have any issues .... I love it but guess it may have to go back !!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. We installed it without the downrod and it looks great. I didn't realize when I bought it that there were no chains to pull for light/fan functions. Hope the remote doesn't get lost... The lightbulbs are a little dim but that's an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but way under-performs
customer_reviews.text: Fan is pretty but it moves very little air. Yes, it’s on the correct setting. My patio is very small, and I can barely feel any air from this fan. Huge disappointment as I had to spend money on the installation. To add insult to injury, I paid extra to have it delivered quickly, and it didn’t arrive on time.
customer_reviews.author: Janel McCann

customer_reviews.title: Dead unit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan but arrived DOA per my contractor and my electrician. Naturally, the return window is closed. I paid $189 for a junk fan and $250 an hour for a specialist to tell me this. We will not be rolling the dice on another Merrimack.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It is almost 3 years running smoothly no issues Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: ABDUL MAHMAD

customer_reviews.title: It’s Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our Nautical Theme Pool and Patio area for our new Home and they are unbelievable, Looks Sooo Much more expensive the the worker on our home was so impressed Terrific Value
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: ... and installing to find out that it has a bad receiver. Light won't turn off and it isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Just spent an hour assembling and installing to find out that it has a bad receiver. Light won't turn off and it isn't a programming issue. It's a bad fan issue. Will be returning and not replacing. Too bad cause the wife loved how it looks. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice "antique" look. Light is bright but has an Edison bulb effect with the glass bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Drew H.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months it stopped working. Had my electrician out who installed it and after checking it out said it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Seidner

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Hangs extremely crooked, the return and support window is closed now and I am not happy!!! The fan should of never left the warehouse with how bad it is.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I installed the fan and realized that the remote was the only way to control fan/light functions. Aside from that I was impressed by the easy assembly. What really bugs me though is that the light, after about a month, started to be inconsistent. The light is now not nearly as bright as when first installed. I may look at replacing this fan in the coming months. I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Moore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You can NOT wire for separate light/ fan wall switching. Only two wires exist. You must use remotes even with 2 fans on a porch. I would have returned if not such a PIA. They are noisy too. I paid electrician to rewire then these are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: j mark nichols

customer_reviews.title: Vice quality well great look for a patio
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law had this fan on her back porch and lost during the hurricane. She wanted the exact same one. Local store no longer had so I was really glad we were able to find online and make her happy. The look of it looks like you paid way more for it then you did.
customer_reviews.author: LHMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan!!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a rustic, high quality fan for my cabin home. When I bought this online I wasn't sure about the quality, I thought it may be cheap looking. Much to my surprise it's not cheap looking at all. It works great and the light switch remote is nice to have because I can't reach the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this 100 times over if I had the cash! Gorgeous fan. Works well. Decent light output. Quiet. And fan definitely moves air well.
customer_reviews.author: kara

customer_reviews.title: Picture does not match the product.
customer_reviews.text: The light fixture color is not like the picture. The picture shows a darker color, but the color is actually antique gold like the description. However, it was easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gollaher

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I love this light and fan but we put the light in August and it was bright and beautiful but its now October and its so dim you can not even tell its on. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Custome

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan that works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan, I was going to buy it at Lowes but found it at a lower price here even with my Lowes 10% veteran discount. It works great and looks fantastic on our new patio.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael E. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Nice for outdoor patio
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and fit together well. The "New England" lamp light look fits in with an outdoor rustic setting patio. The motor is very quiet and it puts out adequate airflow. I did need to balance the blades but the weights are included. It's pretty easy to do to get a vibration free spin. I'm pleased with the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan and have received several compliments. Just a FYI if using outside in an A frame structure the downrod may not be long enough. A quick trip to Lowe’s and back in business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, lighting is dim though
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan that is a great fan; however, the lights are a bit dim. I'm going to try a larger watt to see how much brighter I can get it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know since it is not working without remote
customer_reviews.text: Remote did not work called for replacement was told 5 days but still not arrived called x2
customer_reviews.author: INGE BOYD

customer_reviews.title: Annoying humming sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a couple years ago and liked it so much I decided to purchase one for another room. After about an hour install I come to find the motor making an annoying humming sound. My other fan is silent. Good luck sleeping under this thing. The remote control is different than the one I purchased previously. Maybe the speed control is different causing one to hum and not the other? Other than that the fan looks good and blows a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: jamie wallace

customer_reviews.title: I love the style
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 5 of these fans in the last year and ALL of them have bulb issues - they either didn’t all work or burned out within the first few days. I love the style, indirect light and dimming control though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Third one
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these installed on our outdoor decks, very nice look, works like it should, and the remote control is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: EFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but lots of issues
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a month, then had to duct tape a button on the fan to keep it from moving over. This is the button that dictates which direction the blades spin. Then the remote stopped working and since it is all built into the fan i couldnt turn the light back on. Looks nice but lots of issues, not worth the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful buy
customer_reviews.text: Just Beautiful! We have on our back deck and at night it light every thing up .
customer_reviews.author: Bean6

customer_reviews.title: A good looking ceiling fan!
customer_reviews.text: Used these at my house on the porch. Then bought again for the river house porch. So many compliments. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T C Drinkard

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: The product was too copper bronze for me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...
customer_reviews.text: This remote control fan is crap...second remote control and still can’t operate the fan...save your money...
customer_reviews.author: Rob Covington

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan...this was my 2nd one and they function really well and look great! Wish they had a pull chain control as well but only work with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Vaccaro

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions, easy to put together. Bought two - remotes were tuned from the factory to be different so each remote operates the fan it came with and not both.
customer_reviews.author: MudFlap

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 fans for my covered outdoor patio. Pros: - powerful, circulates air well - Design & finish is beautiful - lights can be dimmed - good price Cons: - only way to control the Fan is using the remote ( remote looks like a cheap build) - one of the fan wobbles while running. Tried to balance with provided weights. Stopped wobbling for a week and started again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Buttianda

customer_reviews.title: Look great and easy installation for someone who is handy.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these fan for our patio area and I love them. My husband is very handy when it comes to these type of projects and he was able to install them without any trouble whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Teel

customer_reviews.title: The remote & color
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for out patio!! The color was perfect
customer_reviews.author: rxd

customer_reviews.title: Check all parts before installing
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged. We were unable to get in touch with anyone at amazon due to Covid-19. Because we had already installed it we left it up damaged. Disappointed to pay full price and have a damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Tomorrow

customer_reviews.title: Great looking outdoor fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking fan. Works well with the remote. I like being able to dim the lights using the remote as well. The blades are kind of plastic which should hold up very well in humid or damp weather.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love love. Used it on our hot day. Worked well. Even the cat loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Synced two to one remote to simplify.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, rustic looking fans for my patio! Dimming, remote controlled lights and fans are fantastic. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was well packaged without damage and with all parts in box. Impressed with quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Outdoor Fan and excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful outdoor ceiling fan! I guess one could install this fan by themselves, but we chose to hire someone. And our electrician said that this was a really good fan and well built and easy to Install.
customer_reviews.author: Marie G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and runs smooth. Love it. About ready to buy another it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Streeter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan for my covered patio
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan for my covered patio. It has a wide dimming range and a very user friendly remote. Added a 24” downrod and it is very quiet with no visible shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: This makes 4 I have bought. They are solidly built and withstand the weather outside yearround.
customer_reviews.author: JD Sanders

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! It's on our patio and looks so good. The instructions were easy to follow for us beginners and everything. The remote is a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great fans for the patio!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Installation was relatively straight forward. The fans work well work the bond pro for smart home integration.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Quiet nice looking fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan . This is my 3rd one .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T.

customer_reviews.title: Metal on Metal whine
customer_reviews.text: Shame that you spend this kind of money and on High the fan over time has a loud whine to it (like metal on metal) I've verified that the fan is level and balanced (1st checked that) won't do it on Lvl's 1 & 2 but only on high. Shame
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T. Mirus

customer_reviews.title: pretty simple installation
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, somewhat easy to install. This is the first time I've ordered ceiling fans online that weren't broken when delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great Fans
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these fans. I ordered 2 for our new enclosed deck. Tested them on a really humid 90° day and they made the deck so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JEochardo

customer_reviews.title: Great look, breeze, remote
customer_reviews.text: Remote and appearance are great. Have on outdoor porch and it looks great. Creates a nice breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kristn Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice and match my door handle on my front door. We have synchronized the fans on one remote and it cools off the porch very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hideous
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks like someone took down their old brass fan from the eighties and sponge painted it with brown.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: I would give this fan a 4 star review if I felt like it was worth the material but it's not
customer_reviews.text: the blades are plastic and the fan motor was loud until i finished adding the light fixture. I would give this fan a 4 star review if I felt like it was worth the material but it's not, el-cheapo fan is what you're going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Kdoei

customer_reviews.title: Great for our screened in porch...
customer_reviews.text: These lights look fantastic up, can't wait to use them in our new house!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Solid and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this fan and is very does a great job moving the air at all speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Padavich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my riverside porch .help keep cool and keeps mosquitoes away.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Shervey

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price - looks like it's $250-$300 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the price - looks like it's $250-$300 counterparts. Also comes with balancing kit, which was an unexpected and welcome addition.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth it without hesitance!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastics and well made fan. The look is deceiving as I was elated at the finish and end results once installed, a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this fan
customer_reviews.text: So the remote works maybe 10% of the time. So basically I have a fan and light that looks good during the day time but has no purpose
customer_reviews.author: d fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Picture and product don’t match
customer_reviews.text: The antique bronze fan we received looks nothing like the picture. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Loredo

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAN/LIGHT-- stylish and works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan! QUIET and lovely to look at. The remote is easy to use and works great. The price was excellent. I wish they had more of this fan! I'd definitely purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Judy@Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Dimmer
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for our new screened porch and I love them. The dimmer for the lights is my favorite feature.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice addition to my patio seating area. Harbor Breeze quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the quality of this item. We now own 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: a great choice!
customer_reviews.text: All parts shipped, easy install, wall mounted holder for the remote. Very sharp looking. Soundless operation.
customer_reviews.author: barbara call

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: This item came with the glass globe broken in the bottom of the fan which was not noticeable until a couple of days after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for enclosed porch
customer_reviews.text: It is simple to operate. I had mine professionally installed but I really like it. It looks great and is quiet
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great looking outdoor ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Loved my outdoo ceiling fan. Looks great and my friend that installed it told me it was made well and fairly easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: June Ellen Sanger-Gold

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Nice air flow, and the light is adjustable when you hold down the button on the remote. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Not impressed with remote control function in a multiple fan configuration though. Hard to synchronize and fans don't always respond together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This fan was a disappointment. The airflow was minimal and the size appeared smaller then stated. I returned the fan to a local merchant who carries the fan. The product warranty allowed us to do the exchange locally.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Planning on buying another one for the patio
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. We have it in our outside cabana. Keeps flies, mosquitoes, and the heat at bay...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful out door fan. It was very easy to install. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks fantastic and works great. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: John Schaufler

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, easy to install, may need 60w bulbs but plan on buying 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: James Mellon

customer_reviews.title: it stop working
customer_reviews.text: it stop working and I want to get it fixet
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great fan,quiet,pretty and different. Love it using it in living room cause patio wasn't ready. Now I'm going to buy one for the patio!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Wish the lights were brighter, going to change them Very powerful fan and does the cooling job quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan looks great
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. I got it for my new sceen porch .
customer_reviews.author: Carl E Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! However bulbs didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan but all the light bulbs burned out after three months, need to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: We just love it! Our home was built in 1904 and ...
customer_reviews.text: We just love it! Our home was built in 1904 and it fits beautifully!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fan is nice but if it ends up not working
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!! I bought 2 of these fans in February 2017. I finally had an electrician install them in my bedroom in April. After about 3 weeks of using the fans, one of them quit working entirely. We had the electrician come back out and make sure it wasn't the new wiring and it was found that it was the fan. I tried to contact the company twice and they have yet to get back to me. The fan is nice but if it ends up not working, the company does not return emails.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to hang. Great nautical look to hang at our beach condo!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

product_meta.title: Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Downrod Mount Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote
product_meta.description: With casual style and weatherproof features, this ceiling fan from the Merrimack collection is ideal for a patio or bedroom. Five java finish blades blend with the antique bronze finish base for an understated look, and the globe-style light kit with a clear seeded glass shade provides the right amount of illumination. Use the remote control to create a comfortable atmosphere by changing the fan’s three speed settings with the press of a button. A reversible airflow of 5,188-CFM provides a strong breeze, whether you want to cool down sweltering summer days on the porch or provide snug warmth in your room.
feature_bullets: Award winning contemporary design ceiling fan has an outstanding beauty with lifetime of durability. This industry recognized name brand fan is built to look very attractive and last. This stunning and newly updated model has even more durable materials, powerful quiet motor technology and includes brilliant energy efficient led lighting.
Indoor/outdoor antique bronze finish ceiling fan from the Merrimack collection features 5 weatherproof java finish blades
